name: Henrietta's Book of Spells: Fun With Words for 7-14 Year Olds
overview: An educational and puzzle game that is a sequel to Scetlander's HOORAY TO HENRIETTA, which was released in 1990 for the Amiga. According to the box, HENRIETTA: BOOK OF SPELLS included a "Morgana the Morbid" colour badge.The game can be customised to use English words different to the ones supplied or words from foreign languages (see instructions below). High scores can be reset by deleting the 'scores.dat' file.
